title.jp: Tenshi no Challenge Jelly Trial / Kinniku Ryuuryuu Tantanmen

synopsis: Milfeulle accidentally turns her fellow Angels invisible with food from a ramen stand. / Ranpha meets a muscular man who claims they knew each other when they were children.

title.jp: Zenryaku Tameiki no Ballottine / Bikkuri Tenshin

synopsis: The team takes a detour on a mission to help an elderly man deliver a tsuchinoko kigurumi for a festival. / When a lost technology accidentally makes its way into some sweets, the team has some "big" problems.

title.jp: Omoide Gekisou Happousai / Tachikomeru Kiri no Sorbet

synopsis: Ranpha and Mifeulle get distracted by a lost robot acquaintance while investigating a lost technology. / Mint and Vanilla encounter strange natives on a planet covered in a mysterious fog.

title.jp: Koi no Nikogori Junjou Tsutsumiage / Wedding Cake Gattai Special

synopsis: Commanders Huey and Volcott get into arguments while talking about the old days. / The team must pilot a new weapon which requires the five pilots to work together perfectly.

title.jp: GA Kaiseki Kaiseki / Okonomi Fukushuu Lunch

synopsis: There's a team of thieves on the loose who seem to look a lot like the Angels... / When it appears that Vanilla is killed, Normad takes revenge on the team.

title.jp: Higan e no Kaitenzushi / Hagane no Jambalaya

synopsis: A mysterious technology ends up switching bodies among the Angel Brigade. / Forte and Commander Volcott are sent to investigate a battle droid that forces them to revisit their past.

title.jp: Kinai Shoku (Gudakusan Benkai Curry) / Ai to Giwaku no Monja (機内食

synopsis: The team revels in the success of a mission, but can't seem to remember how they won... / A stranger kidnaps Normad and it's up to Vanilla to get him back.

title.jp: Shinsen Toretate Kyoui no Funamori / Kindan no Meuniere Miwaku no Yamakake

synopsis: While on vacation, the team tries to catch a monstrous fish to win a big prize. / The team is tasked with protecting an endangered species which is the main ingredient in a product to keep people forever young.

title.jp: Tsukinashi Tsukimi Soba / Daremo Mita Koto no Nai Nazo no Carpaccio

synopsis: Mifeulle has a very unlucky day off. / The team is given new outfits that give them super powers, but can their friendships survive these new abilities?

title.jp: Gun Smoke and Tobacco Smoke Cassoulet

synopsis: Forte requests a day off to meet up with an old acquaintance to get advice on a serious manner.
